alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 26 at 10:03AM CDT until March 28 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Portions of secondary roads near Old Highway 13 are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 11.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet this evening. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
